title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go

questions.question: What does Chandler say makes Eddie a better roommate than Hannibal Lecter?
options: Nothing, Chandler says Hannibal Lecter is a better roommate
questions.correct_answer: Nothing, Chandler says Hannibal Lecter is a better roommate
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Hannibal Lecter...better roommate than you.'

questions.question: Why does Eddie want Chandler to say he wants him out?
options: Eddie wants to hear it from Chandler's lips
Eddie wants to make sure Chandler means it
Eddie wants to write it down
questions.correct_answer: Eddie wants to hear it from Chandler's lips
questions.explanation: Eddie says 'I want to hear you say it, I, I want to hear you say you want me out.'

questions.question: What is the name of the book that Monica, Rachel, and Phoebe are discussing?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Didn't it like totally speak to you? ... Be Your Own Windkeeper.'

questions.question: What is the name of the character Joey used to play on Days of Our Lives?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I was Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Joey's good mood despite losing his job?
options: He just got a new job
He's confident in his acting abilities
He just bought a new hat
questions.correct_answer: He's confident in his acting abilities
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Hey, I'll be alright. I mean it's not like I'm starting from square one. I was Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives.'

questions.question: What does Ross buy for Joey to cheer him up?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'My gift to you man.' and hands Joey a porcelain dog.

questions.question: Why does Chandler tell Eddie that he already has a roommate?
options: Because Chandler doesn't want to live with Eddie
Because Joey is moving back in
Because Chandler is trying to protect himself
questions.correct_answer: Because Chandler is trying to protect himself
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'I'm sorry... I already have a roommate.' to get rid of Eddie.

questions.question: What does Eddie take with him when he leaves Chandler's apartment?
questions.explanation: Eddie says 'You want some help... No help required Chico.' and takes the goldfish.

questions.question: What is the name of the soap opera that Joey auditions for as a cab driver?
questions.explanation: Estelle says 'I already got you an audition for Another World.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's argument with Ross?
options: Ross is not listening to her
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'No, see this isn't about the movie theatre, this is about you stealing my wind.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe compare Jason Hurley to?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'You are such a leaf blower.'

questions.question: What is the object that Chandler is holding in a rather interesting position at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Chandler is holding the porcelain dog by the rear in a rather interesting position.

questions.question: Why does Joey not want to give up his porcelain dog?
options: Because it's a gift from Ross
Because it's part of his ceramic zoo
Because it's a good luck charm
questions.correct_answer: Because it's part of his ceramic zoo
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Well, I had a whole ceramic zoo thing goin' over there but now, without the other ones, it just looks tacky.'

questions.question: What does Gunther used to be on All My Children?
questions.explanation: Gunther says 'I used to be Bryce on All My Children.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Eddie's behavior?
options: He is trying to protect himself
He is trying to help Chandler
He is trying to drive Chandler crazy
questions.explanation: Eddie's behavior is erratic and unpredictable, suggesting that he is not sane.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when Eddie forces his head into the door?
options: He tries to reason with Eddie
He unchains the door and opens it
questions.correct_answer: He unchains the door and opens it
questions.explanation: Chandler unchains the door and opens it, trying to get rid of Eddie.

questions.question: What is the name of the agency that Estelle works for?
questions.explanation: The scene is set at the Estelle Leonard Talent Agency.

questions.question: What does Joey say he could attend to if the cab crashes in the audition scene?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I could attend to the victims 'cause I have a background in medical acting.'

questions.question: What is the amount that Joey owes on his VISA bill?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Oh my God, how did I spend so much money?' and Ross says 'That's just the minimum amount due, that's your total due.'

questions.question: What is the name of the store where Eddie gets the mannequin head?
questions.explanation: Eddie says 'I got it in the junior miss department, big diff. Anyway check it out man, it's gonna make a hell of a conversation piece at our next cocktail party, huh pal?'

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about the book 'Be Your Own Windkeeper'?
options: It's about how women need to become more empowered
It's about how men need to become more empowered
It's about how to make friends
questions.correct_answer: It's about how women need to become more empowered
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Yeah and oh, and but there's, there's wind and the wind can make us Goddesses.'

questions.question: What does Joey say he was on Days of Our Lives?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I was Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Eddie when he finds out that Eddie is still in the apartment?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Get out. Get out, get out, get out, get out, get out, get out.'

questions.question: What does Ross say to Joey about his acting career?
options: You should hold out for something bigger
questions.correct_answer: You should hold out for something bigger
questions.explanation: Ross says 'You should hold out for something bigger. I could never do what you do Joey.'

questions.question: What does Monica say about the book 'Be Your Own Windkeeper'?
questions.explanation: Monica says 'It's like reading about every relationship I've ever had, except for Richard.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about men and wind?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Yeah and oh, and but there's, there's wind and the wind can make us Goddesses. But you know who takes out wind? Men, they just take it.'

questions.question: What does Joey say about his ceramic zoo?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Well, I had a whole ceramic zoo thing goin' over there but now, without the other ones, it just looks tacky.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say about Eddie's behavior?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Ding dong, the psycho's gone.'

questions.question: What does Ross say about Joey's acting career?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'I could never do what you do Joey. I have respect for you.'
